details.flavorText:
Assassins commit murder, either for pay or due to their belief in a cause, such as a religion or a political movement. Some assassins work alone and choose their own victims. Others are members of assassins' guilds, organizations that accept contracts to kill in return for money, favors, or both.

Some criminals are the desperate who have no option but to break the law to survive, while others choose a life of crime for thrills, forming gangs or underworld guilds that specialize in certain illegal ventures.

description.value: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.
The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Activate1 Interact

After you drink this elixir, your sight becomes sharper in darkness. You gain darkvision for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)]{Effect: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)}

Giant centipede venom causes severe muscle stiffness.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 17 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d8 #poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d12 #poison]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)
An invisibility potion is colorless and oddly lightweight. Upon drinking it, you gain the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
The assassin can move their full speed when @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak]{Sneaking}.

The assassin isn't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to creatures of 8th level or lower that are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected}, flanking or using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Surprise Attack]{Surprise Attack}.

Trigger: The assassin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see.

Effect: The assassin gains a +2 ciurcumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

items.0:
Requirements The assassin is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand.

Effect The assassin applied a poison to the weapon.

description.value:
Requirements The assassin is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand.

Effect The assassin applied a poison to the weapon.

items.name: Poison Weapon

description.value: The assassin @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Interact]{Interacts} to draw a weapon, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strikes} with that weapon.
On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to the assassin.

The assassin deals an extra [[/r 2d6 #precision]] precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} creatures.

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.
